pr_title: Populate ClientInfo in Verifier JDBC queries

timeline.bodyText: Just double check: is this the original query id? :)
timeline.author: wenleix

replies.bodyText: Theoretically this could be anything provided in the xdb, but yes it is the original query ID for FB use cases.
replies.author: caithagoras

timeline.bodyText: A common pattern in Presto code base is to have a private static final OBJECT_MAPPER in this class 😃  . But either way is fine :)
